story: As a Visitor, I want to open the interactive map, so that I can see live road closures
As a Developer, I want to deploy the application, so that I can run integration tests
As a Shopper, I want to apply a coupon and checkout, so that I pay less
As a Manager, I want to generate quarterly reports, so that the data warehouse is populated with sales metrics
As a Data Analyst, I want to open the retention dashboard, so that I can compare monthly churn
